snippet: By winning a gold medal on Sunday, the sailor Ben Ainslie also gave a lift to the Fantastic Sausage Factory in Weymouth, England, which had been having a slow Olympics.
abstract: By winning a gold medal on Sunday, the sailor Ben Ainslie also gave a lift to the Fantastic Sausage Factory in Weymouth, England, which had been having a slow Olympics.

headline.main: Weymouth Journal: British Victory Spurs Sausage Sales
headline.print_headline: Weymouth Journal: British Victory Spurs Sausage Sales
